name: F100 Kids' Football Goalkeeper Shirt - Green
description: Our design team developed this T-shirt to keep you dry and comfortable when playing tennis. Also suitable for other racket sports. Thanks to its synthetic fabric, the TTS100 provides both excellent moisture management and superior comfort. Plus, it comes in different styles to suit your mood!

name: Kids' T-Shirt TTS100 - Camo/Black
description: Our designers developed this T-shirt for playing tennis, or other racket sports, in hot weather. This kids' tennis T-shirt is extremely comfortable. You'll love its light and breathable fabric. Your future champ will love its style and graphics.

name: Kids' T-Shirt TTS100 - Camo/Black
description: Our passionate tennis team developed this tennis T-shirt for your training sessions and matches. You'll love playing in this comfortable T-shirt thanks to its soft feel, breathable fabric and slightly higher cut over the hips

name: MENS TENIS SHORTS TTS100 - Camo/Black
description: Our passionate tennis team developed this tennis T-shirt for your training sessions and matches. You'll love playing in this comfortable T-shirt thanks to its soft feel, breathable fabric and slightly higher cut over the hips

name: MENS TENIS SHORTS TTS100 - Camo/Black
description: Our passionate tennis team developed this tennis T-shirt for your training sessions and matches. You'll love playing in this comfortable T-shirt thanks to its soft feel, breathable fabric and slightly higher cut over the hips

name: Kids' Tennis Shoes TS130 - Asteroid
description: TS130 trainers have been designed for your child to wear for their everyday activities. These versatile, durable, affordable trainers are easy to look after and have a rip-tab providing a great fit and support. Perfect for your child's occasional sports activities.

name: Adult's Tennis Shoes TS130 - Asteroid
description: TS130 trainers have been designed for your child to wear for their everyday activities. These versatile, durable, affordable trainers are easy to look after and have a rip-tab providing a great fit and support. Perfect for your child's occasional sports activities.

name: Adult Aluminium Tennis Racket - TR100
description: Our design team developed this product so you can try out tennis at an affordable price. With its large head for forgiveness, an oval handle for comfort and an aluminium frame for good durability, the TR100 is ideal for learning tennis

name: Adult Composite Tennis Racket - TR160 Lite
description: Our design team developed this product so you can try out tennis at an affordable price. With its large head for forgiveness, an oval handle for comfort and an aluminium frame for good durability, the TR100 is ideal for learning tennis

name: Turnball Set - 1 Post + 2 Rackets + 1 Elastic String Ball
description: Our designers developed this ball for children aged 9 to 12 to use while improving and for adults learning tennis. This ball has been approved by the International Tennis Federation (STAGE 1). Its slower speed and lower bounce are suitable for intermediate children and also adults learning tennis.

name: Tennis Racket Cover - Black/White
description: Our designers developed this cover for beginner players looking for an easy way to transport and protect their tennis racket. With its foam element and strap, this cover for an adult-size tennis racket protects your racket and makes it easy for you to carry it.
